definition: of persons freed from or not subject to an obligation or liability to which others or other things are subject, grant exemption or release to
details:
adjective
- of persons freed from or not subject to an obligation or liability to which others or other things are subject
= example: of persons freed from or not subject to an obligation or liability to which others or other things are subject
- of goods or funds, not subject to taxation
= example: of goods or funds, not subject to taxation
= synonyms: nontaxable
verb
- grant exemption or release to
= synonyms: excuse, relieve, let off
- grant relief or an exemption from a rule or requirement to
= example: grant relief or an exemption from a rule or requirement to
= synonyms: free
